Description: Pottery bowl made of rough straw-tempered Nile silt with flaring sides and everted rim; coarsely made.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: E. R. Ayrton & W. L. S. Loat, Pre-dynastic cemetery at El Mahasna (London, 1911), p. 24; pl. xxxi. 7g Like Late ware L7g in in Petrie’s Corpus of Prehistoric Pottery. H130a marked on base.
